publicationstmt.publisher: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2015

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Department of Psychology

did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Psychology records
did.abstract: This small collection includes some correspondence, meeting minutes, reports, proposals and other materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This small collection of records includes correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, brochures, and other documents. Included is the 1994 proposal for a PhD in Clinical Psychology.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is arranged into these general types of documents:

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Some materials may have restricted access. Please contact the archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-64, Xavier University Department of Psychology records, Special Collections and Archives, Xavier University, Cincinnati, Ohio.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Additions to this collection are expected.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

did.unittitle: Brochures and Training Program for Police Supervisors

scopecontent.p: This folder contains brochures for the doctoral program in psychology and also "A Report on Police Community Relations Training Program for Police Supervisors in Cincinnati, Ohio."

did.unittitle: Proposal for Doctoral Program in Clinical Psychology

scopecontent.p: This folder contains various documents: Academic Program Review: Department of Psychology: Undergraduate Program; Academic Program Review: The MA Psychology Program with a Concentration in General Experimental Psychology; Program Review: Industrial-Organizational Psychology Graduate Program; Draft of Psy.D. Program Review.
